name: BP Bulk Delete
author: PhiloPress

sections.description:
An Admin Tool plugin for bulk deletions. Works with BuddyPress and the BuddyBoss Platform.

It allows admins to bulk delete Activity, Group Activity, Message and Notification entries & meta based on an ‘older than’ date.

Adds a link under Tools menu.

Note: for Messages and Notifications, it will delete BOTH read and unread entries.

There are action hooks for pre and post deletion for all four entry types.

If you are using BuddyBoss and would like to also delete associated media, please see: BP Bulk Delete Pro

For more plugins, please visit PhiloPress

sections.faq:
Is there an UnDo after deletions?

No!
sections.changelog:
1.5

  • bug fix re Notifications Bulk Delete date selector

1.4

  • adds checks for active components

1.3

  • adds an option to delete group activity only

1.2

  • fix minor bug re creation of sub-menu admin page

1.1.0

  • add hooks for pre and post bulk deletion

1.0.0

  • initial release
